featured.title: AI Security & Red Teaming Framework
featured.description: Advanced framework for stress-testing Large Language Models and identifying vulnerabilities in AI systems through systematic red teaming approaches

details.overview: Developed a comprehensive framework for AI security testing focused on Large Language Models. This project involves systematic red teaming approaches to identify vulnerabilities and strengthen ethical safeguards in AI systems, contributing to building more trustworthy AI applications.
challenges: Developing effective stress-testing methodologies for LLMs
Balancing security testing with ethical considerations
Ensuring comprehensive coverage of potential vulnerabilities

featured.title: Supply Chain ML Forecasting System
featured.description: Machine learning-powered forecasting system for supply chain management with seasonality analysis and trend prediction capabilities

details.overview: Developed an advanced machine learning system for supply chain forecasting at Titan Engineering & Automation Limited. The system addresses demand variability, performs seasonality analysis, and provides trend predictions to optimize inventory management and strategic planning.
challenges: Integrating with existing SAP SCM systems
Ensuring forecast accuracy across different time horizons

featured.title: Board Game Review Prediction
featured.description: Machine learning model to predict board game reviews and ratings using advanced data analytics and prediction algorithms

details.overview: Developed a comprehensive machine learning model to predict board game reviews and ratings. This project involves data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, and evaluation to accurately predict user reviews based on various game characteristics and player feedback patterns.
challenges: Handling diverse and unstructured review data
Feature selection for optimal model performance
Dealing with bias in user reviews

featured.title: Drug Response Prediction System
featured.description: AI-powered system to predict drug responses using machine learning algorithms for healthcare applications

details.overview: Developed an advanced machine learning system to predict drug responses in patients. This project focuses on personalized medicine by analyzing patient data and drug characteristics to predict treatment effectiveness and potential side effects.
challenges: Ensuring model accuracy for critical decisions

other.title: Academia Campus Repository
other.description: Comprehensive academic repository system for managing and organizing campus-related data and resources

other.title: Autonomous Security Code Analysis
other.description: Agent-based system for secure code analysis using autonomous security protocols

other.title: AI Research Initiatives
